snippet.title: RollMe - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
RollMe is a unique adventure game where players take on the role of a customizable ball as they navigate through a series of increasingly challenging levels. The game features five acts, with over 100 levels, each with its unique themes and obstacles. Players can change the appearance of the ball with various skins available to personalize their experience. Unlock achievements as you progress through the game and track your progress with a ranking system. Suitable for players of all ages and skill levels, RollMe offers a fun, engaging, and challenging gameplay experience. 
Prepare yourself and add the game to your wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1749120/RollMe/

Follow us on Facebook to get the latest updates or visit http://www.infinityscoregames.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InfinityScoreGames
